summary: Small quest in which the player takes on an ancient foe of Tamriel
descriptionHtml:
A small quest for high level players in which you learn of an ancient evil which predates the Daedra and seeks to re-conquer all of Tamriel. . Note: You must have dialogue subtitles turned on in options->display to view actor dialogue as there is no voice acting. 

Installation
==========
Unpack, Copy everything to the data folder and enable the data file in skyrim launcher. To start this quest read the book on the altar of Merhunes Dagon.

Compatibility
============
Wont be compatible with any mod which modifies ReachwindEyrie or the small islands in the far NE of the world map.

V1:   Mod has been cleaned with TES5EDIT for better performance

V1.2: Added Silent Voice files so the dialogue does not skip past, added seq file to stop the dialogue bug happening.

V1.3: Vastly improved the monster/weapon textures by adding proper normal maps

V1.4: Fixed bug where minions were not being spawned, fixed map marker bug, Fixed missing walls

Check out Revenge of Dagoth Ur
author: Morrowind1979
